Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokic made a brutally honest admission about his teamâ€™s shooting after the game saying 'We are not a good shooting team, except Mike and Jamal. All of us are kind of streaky, not streaky, but just average shooters.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denver Nuggets dropped their season opener to the OKC Thunder, scoring just 87 points and converting on just seven of their 38 three-point attempts (18.4 percent)
Others: The Nuggets lost Kentavious Caldwell-Pope in free agency, who was a 41.5 percent three-point shooter in his two seasons in Denver
